query.prompt:

query.result: 1 Of new suffering I must make verses 2 and furnish matter for the twentieth canto 3 of the first canzon, which is of the submerged.

4 Io era già disposto tutto quanto 5 a riguardar ne lo scoperto fondo, 6 che si bagnava d’angoscioso pianto;

7 e vidi gente per lo vallon tondo 8 venir, tacendo e lagrimando, al passo 9 che fanno le letane in questo mondo.
query.result: 7 and I saw people coming through the round valley, 8 silent and weeping, at the pace 9 that litanies are sung in this world.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English.

query.result: 10 As my gaze descended lower upon them, 11 it appeared, marvelously, that each was reversed 12 between the chin and the beginning of the chest,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English.
13 ché da le reni era tornato ’l volto, 14 e in dietro venir li convenia, 15 perché ’l veder dinanzi era lor tolto.
query.result: 13 for their face had been turned around at the loins, 14 and they had to come on backwards, 15 because they were prevented from looking ahead.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English.
16 Forse per forza già di parlasia 17 si travolse così alcun del tutto; 18 ma io nol vidi, né credo che sia.

Please translate each line literally into English.

query.result: 19 If God allows you, reader, to derive benefit 20 from your reading, now consider for yourself 21 how I could keep my face dry,

query.prompt:

query.result: 22 when I saw our human form so twisted up close, 23 that the tears from their eyes 24 were bathing their buttocks through the crack.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English.

query.result: 25 Indeed I wept, leaning against one 26 of the boulders of the hard cliff, so that my escort 27 said to me: “Are you still one of the fools?

query.prompt:

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English.

query.result: 61 Up in beautiful Italy lies a lake, 62 at the foot of the Alps that enclose Germany 63 above Tyrol, which is called Benaco.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English.
